mapper.select:
select A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id, A.shang_ke_xue_yuan_lei_xing, A.xue_yuan_id, A.bu_ke_ji_lu_id, A.shi_ting_ji_lu_id, B.xing_ming as xueYuanXingMing, C.bei_zhu, C.kou_chu_ke_shi, C.shang_ke_xue_yuan_lei_xing, C.xue_yuan_dao_ke_zhuang_tai, C.ke_xiao_jine, D.sheng_yu_ke_shi, E.shou_ji from pai_ke_ji_lu_shang_ke_xue_yuan_zu A join xue_yuan B on A.xue_yuan_id = B.id left join dian_ming_ji_lu C on A.xue_yuan_id = C.xue_yuan_id and C.pai_ke_ji_lu_id = #{pai_ke_ji_lu_id} left join xue_yuan_ke_cheng D on A.xue_yuan_id = D.xue_yuan_id and D.ke_cheng_id = #{ke_cheng_id} and D.is_deleted = 0 join zhang_hao E on B.zhang_hao_id = E.id
A.is_deleted = 0 and B.is_deleted = 0 and A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id = #{pai_ke_ji_lu_id}

select A.id, A.shang_ke_ri_qi, A.shang_ke_shi_jian_start, A.shang_ke_shi_jian_end, A.shang_ke_lao_shi_id, A.shang_ke_nei_rong, A.pai_ke_ji_lu_zhuang_tai, B.xing_ming as shangKeLaoShiXingMing from pai_ke_ji_lu A join lao_shi B on A.shang_ke_lao_shi_id = B.id
A.id = #{id}

select A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id, A.xue_yuan_id, A.shang_ke_xue_yuan_lei_xing, B.xue_yuan_dao_ke_zhuang_tai, C.xing_ming as xueYuanXingMing, C.tou_xiang from pai_ke_ji_lu_shang_ke_xue_yuan_zu A left join dian_ming_ji_lu B on B.xue_yuan_id = A.xue_yuan_id and B.pai_ke_ji_lu_id = A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id left join xue_yuan C on C.id = A.xue_yuan_id
A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id = #{pai_ke_ji_lu_id} and A.is_deleted = 0

select A.id, A.cheng_zhang_ji_lu_lei_xing, A.jia_zhang_yi_du, A.nei_rong, A.xue_yuan_id, A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id from cheng_zhang_ji_lu A
A.pai_ke_ji_lu_id = #{pai_ke_ji_lu_id} and A.cheng_zhang_ji_lu_lei_xing = 'KE_HOU_DIAN_PING'

select A.cheng_zhang_ji_lu_id, B.id, B.ming_cheng, B.hou_zhui, B.oss_key, B.oss_bucket_name, B.da_xiao from cheng_zhang_ji_lu_cheng_zhang_ji_lu_wen_jian_zu A join cheng_zhang_ji_lu_wen_jian B on A.cheng_zhang_ji_lu_wen_jian_id = B.id and B.is_deleted = 0
A.cheng_zhang_ji_lu_id = #{cheng_zhang_ji_lu_id}
